sentences.en: A COMPARATIVE STUDY OF MONGOLIAN AND GREEK EPICS.
sentences.cn: 试论希腊艺术中的“模仿”.

sentences.en: B Oh yes. It's near the bridge over the lake. It's next to a Mongolian restaurant.
sentences.cn: B哦,是的. 它就在湖上那座桥的附近, 就在那家火锅店傍边.

sentences.en: Because is injured, will hit the double waist will be with Mongolian Tarry.
sentences.cn: 由于受伤, 打双后腰的将是和蒙塔里.

sentences.en: Chapter Three, study in the Manchu and the Mongolian cognates.
sentences.cn: 第三章, 满蒙书面语同源词研究.

sentences.en: Earth were born normal Che - hung is the Mongolian Lingbao.
sentences.cn: 天地所生,正常就是鸿蒙灵宝了.

sentences.en: Hongshanzui port is the history of Sino - Mongolian trade route.
sentences.cn: 红 山嘴 口岸历史上是中蒙贸易通道.

sentences.en: Ming upstairs tombstone, with Manchu, Mongolian , Han Emperor engraved text.
sentences.cn: 明楼上有墓碑, 用满 、 蒙 、 汉文字刻着皇帝的庙号.

sentences.en: Mongolian conqueror Genghis Khan is riding a horse opposite Napoleon.
sentences.cn: “一代天骄”成吉思汗骑在马上与拿破仑并驾齐驱.

sentences.en: Mongolian medicine is the important component section of traditional medicine.
sentences.cn: 蒙医药学是传统医学的重要组成部分.

sentences.en: Objective : To investigate optimum process and quality standard of Mongolian medicine Sanzi Capsules.
sentences.cn: 目的研究 蒙药 三子胶囊剂的成型工艺及质量控制标准.

sentences.en: Of the 19 mummies examined, only three are Mongolian.
sentences.cn: 检验的19个干尸中，只有三个是蒙古人。

sentences.en: Offerings in Mongolian and Tibetan Affairs Swire, Hanqi deep plot Yam.
sentences.cn: 冥蒙藏太古, 寒气积阴深.

sentences.en: Ophthalmologic system of Mongolian Medicine was evolved in 17 th century.
sentences.cn: 蒙医眼科在十七世纪前已形成了系统.

sentences.en: Promoted to capital of the Empire in 1267 by the Mongolian Yuan dynasty, no other historic capital has been remodelled in this way, at such a scale or at such speed.
sentences.cn: 提倡建成公元1267年蒙古人统治的元朝皇都的样子，历史上没有哪个首都被这样子重新改建，而且还是以如此这般的规模或如此这般的速度。

sentences.en: Since ancient times , Mongolian have been nomadic.
sentences.cn: 这次火灾使得秘府中的古籍损失过半.

sentences.en: The inscription is in four languages - Han, Manchurian, Mongolian and Tibetan.
sentences.cn: 这段文字用了四种语言 — 汉 、 满 、 蒙、藏.

sentences.en: The most successful Kalmyk Mongolian businesses are the house building trade and small businesses.
sentences.cn: 卡尔梅克蒙古人最为成功的商业领域是建筑业和小买卖。

sentences.en: This letter is written in Mongolian, and I can not understand it.
sentences.cn: 这封信是用蒙文写的, 我看不懂.

trans.tran_cn: 蒙古的，蒙古人的，蒙古语的，蒙古族的
trans.tran_en: Mongolian means belonging or relating to Mongolia, or to its people, language, or culture

trans.tran_cn: 蒙古人，蒙古国民，蒙古语
trans.tran_en: A Mongolian is a Mongolian citizen, or a person of Mongolian origin
